hymn.title: He is the joy of joys

layout.singingstanza: He is the joy of joys; My thirst He sat -- is -- fied. He is the Song of songs; We mu -- tual -- ly a -- bide.

lyrics.stanza: Fairest of all the fair; He pleases me in full. Noble of nobles, He My prize unmatchable.
Life of all lives is He; From death He makes me rise. Holy of holies, from The world He sanctifies.
Righteous of righteous ones, In Him I stand each day. He is the Strength of strengths, Refreshing on the way.
He, as the Pow'r of pow'rs, Renews with eagles' wings; Vict'ry of victories, O'er all my foes He brings.
Able of able ones, My being He sets free; He is the Might of mights, In spirit strength'ning me.
He is the King of kings, Who now reigns in my heart; He is the Light of lights, Illum'ning every part.
He is the Lord of lords, He now lives in my heart; He is the Way of ways, Who every step does chart.
Hope of all hopes is He, Drawing my heart above; The greatest prize to me, He guides my steps in love.
He is the Love of loves, Worthy to be adored; Patience of patience He, Worthy of praise outpoured.
Greatest of all the great, My adulations raise; Glory of glories He, Deserving all my praise.
